alert.note: Alert for Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 6:44AM EST until December 19 at 2:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Canada Creek at Kast Bridge. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 7.0 feet, Moderate flood stage and several RV parks are inundated with one to two feet of water. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 5.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this morning to a crest of 6.7 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 6.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && West Canada Creek Kast Bridge Flood Stage: 6.0 Observed Stage at Mon 6 am: 5.7 Forecast: Mon 7 am 6.1 Mon 1 pm 6.7 Mon 7 pm 6.1 Tue 1 am 5.5 Tue 7 am 5.1 Tue 1 pm 4.8 Tue 7 pm 4.5 Wed 1 am 4.3 Wed 7 am 4.2 Wed 1 pm 4.4 Wed 7 pm 4.7 Thu 1 am 4.7 &&
